text.section: The department may promulgate administrative regulations establishing license fees, testing fees, and any other fees necessary to operate and maintain a metrology lab within the department. Fees shall be established at a level that shall not exceed the actual cost of operating and maintaining the metrology lab.
All amounts received from any fees imposed under subsection (1) of this section shall be deposited in a restricted fund and shall not be used for any other purpose.

law.history: Created 2010 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 9, effective June 4, 2010.
